snippet.title: Link the animals
snippet.description:
Link the animals is a relaxing, challenging puzzle game where you need to connect each animal with its respective pair. The level ends when all pairs are connected.

* 5 difficulty levels
* More than 340 challenging puzzles
* 20+ animals and other creatures

The game is available for Windows, Mac, Linux, Android and iOS. 


Website: http://link-the-animals.wesoft.com.br/

Get it now:
itch.io: https://wesoft.itch.io/link-the-animals

Mac App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/link-the-animals/id1460482985?ls=1&mt=12

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=br.com.wesoft.linkanimals

iOS App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/link-the-animals/id1461191542?ls=1&mt=8
